amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $475 million provided for operating grants to Amtrak.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $475 million appropriation for the Operating Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 94 - 328 (Roll no. 693).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
